oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Backlund transformations for linear equations with variable coefficients
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JENA, J
SHARMA, VD
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Backlund transformations associated with second-order linear partial differential equations with variable coefficients are derived using the invariance properties. The results are illustrated by constructing solutions of three important equations of mathematical physics.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: NUOVO CIMENTO DELLA SOCIETA ITALIANA DI FISICA B-GENERAL PHYSICS RELATIVITY ASTRONOMY AND MATHEMATICAL PHYSICS AND METHODS, 114(9), 1003-1016
